Then, proceed to extrude the 2D sketch into a 3D model with a depth of 0.375 in the direction of the normal and no depth in the opposite direction of the normal. The scaling factor should also be 0.75 to create the slightly tapered effect. This operation will result in the creation of a new solid body. The Junior CAD designer should now have all the necessary details to construct the part. The height of this intermediate part is 0.75, the width is 0.375, and the length is 0.75. The final shape will result from combining this part with subsequent parts, as per the JSON's operations.</description>
